title: Grilled Avocado Chicken Burger
directions: Mix the chopped avocado, crushed wheat thins, cilantro and garlic separately.
Combine this with the ground chicken breast. Form into 4 to 5 patties.
Get a medium hot grill going and place the burgers on the grill. You only need to flip them once. These should cook quickly. Approximately 3 to 4 minutes per side.
Serve on a bun with a slice of tomato.
ingredients: 1 ripe California grown avocado, cut in small chunks
2/3 cup crushed lime flavored Wheat Thins (if I canâ€™t find Wheat Thins, next time, I will use crushed lime flavored tortilla chips)
